articles.author: Paul P. Murphy, CNN
articles.title: Memorials to the racist former owners of the Washington Redskins and Minnesota Twins are removed - CNN
articles.description: A monument to the former owner of the Washington Redskins and a statue of the former owner of the Minnesota Twins were removed Friday because of the men's racist pasts, the Washington sports authority and the Twins organization said.
